QuestData.Title: Coup de Grace
QuestData.Description: Look at that. Lirastrasza's destroying them!$B$BThere are drakes that she's downing that need finishing off, $n. Wouldn't want the Twilight's healers to get them back up into the air.$B$BTime for a little Coup de Grace.
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver a Coup de Grace on 5 Twilight Skyterrors.
QuestData.RewardText: Our efforts to improve relations with the red dragons has really paid off, $n.
